text:
"He Had Me Hide in The Closet" and 5 Other Horrible Date Stories 
No. 3 is seriously disgusting. By The Editors Valentin Casarsa/ iStock Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 1. “We planned to have our first meeting at a fancy bar. He showed up late — wearing sneakers and a backpack — and his first question was, ‘Do you want to just have a job right now, or do you want to work your whole life and have a career?” I said I wanted a job right now and a career, and he replied, ‘Oh, my mom didn’t work a day after I was born. That’s not for me.’ I said I had to go. A few months later, he messaged me on LinkedIn for a job at my company. Really ?” — Dani C. 24 2. “I went out with a guy who was incredibly insecure. He spent the entire time talking about how much better-looking his brother is — then repeatedly told me that if I met the dude, I’d choose him instead.” — Mary C., 23 3. “Just as he was about to kiss me, he belched in my face . It smelled like a dead pumpkin. I asked him to leave.” — Katie H., 28 4. "For our third date, he invited me over and cooked dinner, although he was still living with his ex-girlfriend. She was supposed to be out of the house for the night but showed up unexpectedly. When she did, he had me hide in the closet — R. Kelly style. I am not in the habit of hiding in people’s houses on dates, so when she went to use the bathroom, I sprinted out of the apartment without saying good-bye.” — Quin T., 24 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 5. “On a double date, while we were all chilling after the meal, he started reading us passages from a book written by the leader of the Confederate army . Nope.” — Kirah., 24 6. “My first date with a guy who was a single dad was going well...until he wanted to show me the video of his child being born . I politely passed... then ran for my car.” — Kari V., 30 This article was originally published as "Dates From Hell " in the March 2017 issue of Cosmopolitan .
